issue.title: [C++] cmake file under windows msys2 system doesn't work
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3390](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3390). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I am trying to get this to build on a windows machine with msys2 installed.  I can generate a Makefile but nothing happens when I run make.  I think it is because for windows, the cmake file changes the shell to cmd.com.  Under msys2, it should run under the msys shell

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3390?focusedCommentId=16634847) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
0.11.0 will be buildable on MSYS2.

See also: https://github.com/kou/MINGW-packages/blob/apache-arrow/mingw-w64-apache-arrow/PKGBUILD
